label: Hue Utilities
info: Register Node-RED as an authorized client for the Hue Bridge API. Access Hue configuration metadata.

label: Hue API
info: Helper subroutine flows for accessing the Hue Bridge API.

name: Hue Scene Auto-Off
info:
If the incoming message indicates that the corresponding HomeKit virtual switch was turned on, activate the corresponding Hue dynamic scene using the first output and send a message to turn the virtual switch off after a delay using the second output.

Both the scene id and auto-off delay are configurable using environment variables defined by this subflow. The default delay is 1000 milliseconds. There is no default scene id.
